description.translate: Unsuspected, surprising, dazzling such is your crystal bite.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Âme de jade\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Insoupçonnée, surprenante, éclatante\"}","{\"text\":\"§7telle est ta morsure de cristal.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Unsuspected, surprising, dazzling\"}","{\"text\":\"§7such is your crystal bite.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7DAR§a2 §7LUC§a1\"}"]}}
